rules_text:
You may pay {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} rather than pay this spell’s mana cost.
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, create a colorless 0/0 Beast Avatar creature token. If that spell was a Revelation, instead create a token that’s a copy of it, except it’s an Avatar creature. Put X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the amount of mana spent to cast that spell.
